sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Vanta Society. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application (the "App"). Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.

subsections.subtitle: Personal Information
items: Email address (for account authentication)
First and last name
Profile image (from Google/Apple sign-in)
Gender assigned at birth
Phone number (optional)
Country code (optional)
Instagram handle (optional)
Invite/referral codes

subsections.subtitle: Health and Fitness Data
items: Current weight and target weight
Physical statistics and fitness goals
Vitals scores (discipline, mindset, strength, momentum, confidence, society)
Daily task completion data
Exercise routine information
Mood and energy tracking
Evening journal entries
Check-in photos (stored locally on your device)

subsections.subtitle: Usage Data
items: App usage statistics and interaction data
Winter Arc start date and progress
Task completion history and streaks
Time spent in the app
Features accessed and actions taken

subsections.subtitle: Device Information
items: Device type and operating system
Unique device identifiers
App version and crash reports
Network information

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, operate, and maintain the Winter Arc challenge and app features
Create and manage your user account
Generate personalized routines and recommendations using AI
Track your progress through the 66-day Winter Arc program
Calculate vitals scores and statistics
Enable community features like leaderboards (using anonymized data)
Process in-app purchases through Apple's App Store
Send you check-in reminders and motivational notifications
Sync your data across devices (when you enable backup)
Improve app performance and user experience
Respond to customer support requests
Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service

sections.title: How We Share Your Information
sections.content: We do NOT sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following limited circumstances:

subsections.subtitle: Third-Party Service Providers
subsections.content: We share data with trusted service providers who help us operate the app:
items: **RevenueCat**: Processes in-app purchases and manages Arc Pass subscriptions (see revenuecat.com/privacy)
**Cloud Storage Provider**: Securely stores your backup data when you enable sync
**Analytics Services**: Helps us understand app usage to improve features (anonymized data only)

subsections.subtitle: Legal Requirements
subsections.content: We may disclose your information if required by law, court order, or government regulation, or if we believe disclosure is necessary to:
items: Comply with legal obligations
Protect our rights, property, or safety
Prevent fraud or illegal activity
Protect the safety of our users or the public

subsections.subtitle: Business Transfers
subsections.content: If Vanta Society is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction. We will notify you via email and/or prominent notice in the app before your information is transferred.

sections.title: Photo Privacy
sections.content: We take special care with your photos:
items: **Evening check-in photos are stored LOCALLY on your device** by default
Photos are NOT automatically uploaded to our servers
Photos are only included in cloud backups if you explicitly enable the sync/backup feature
We never access, view, or share your photos without your explicit consent
You can delete photos at any time from your device
sections.note: We request photo library access solely to allow you to add photos to your evening journal. This permission can be managed in your device Settings.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
items: Data transmission is encrypted using SSL/TLS protocols
Passwords are hashed and never stored in plain text
Access to personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only
Regular security audits and updates
Secure cloud infrastructure with encryption at rest
sections.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy:
items: **Active accounts**: Data is retained while your account is active and for a reasonable period after to allow you to restore access
**Deleted accounts**: Personal information is deleted within 30 days of account deletion request
**Backup data**: Deleted from our servers within 90 days of account deletion
**Legal obligations**: We may retain certain data longer if required by law
**Anonymized data**: We may retain anonymized statistical data indefinitely for research and product improvement

subsections.subtitle: All Users
items: **Access**: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
**Correction**: Update or correct inaccurate information in your profile
**Deletion**: Request deletion of your account and associated data (via in-app "Delete Account" button)
**Data Portability**: Request an export of your data in a machine-readable format
**Opt-Out**: Disable notifications and marketing communications

subsections.subtitle: California Residents (CCPA)
subsections.content: California residents have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act:
items: Right to know what personal information is collected
Right to know if personal information is sold or disclosed (we do NOT sell your data)
Right to opt-out of sale of personal information (not applicable - we don't sell)
Right to non-discrimination for exercising your rights

subsections.subtitle: European Residents (GDPR)
subsections.content: If you are in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have additional rights under GDPR:
items: Right to object to processing of your data
Right to restrict processing under certain circumstances
Right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority
Right to withdraw consent at any time

subsections.subtitle: How to Exercise Your Rights
subsections.content: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@vantasociety.com or use the "Delete Account" feature in the app. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: The App is not intended for children under the age of 13 (or 16 in the EEA). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately, and we will delete such information from our systems.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
sections.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. These countries may have different data protection laws than your country. By using the App, you consent to the transfer of your information to our facilities and service providers located around the world. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Third-Party Links and Services
sections.content: The App may contain links to third-party websites, services, or brands (such as our Marketplace partners). We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to read their privacy policies before providing any information to them.
examples: **Marketplace brands**: When you click on a brand in our Marketplace, you may be directed to external websites. Their privacy practices are governed by their own policies.
**Social media**: If you share content on social media, those platforms' privacy policies apply.
**Payment processing**: In-app purchases are processed by Apple, subject to Apple's Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Health Disclaimer
sections.content: **IMPORTANT**: The App is designed for general fitness and wellness purposes only. It is NOT a medical device and does NOT provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The health and fitness data we collect is for tracking your personal progress only. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before starting any new exercise program or making significant changes to your diet or lifestyle. Individual results may vary.

sections.title: Push Notifications
sections.content: With your permission, we may send you push notifications to remind you about daily tasks, check-ins, and motivational messages. You can disable these at any time through your device settings or in-app notification preferences.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of material changes by:
items: Updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of this policy
Posting a notice in the App
Sending you an email notification (for significant changes)
Requiring you to accept the new policy before continuing to use the App
sections.recommendation: We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the App after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

contactInfo.responseTime: We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days.

sections.title: Apple App Store Compliance
sections.content: This app complies with Apple's App Store Review Guidelines. Please note:
items: Apple is not a sponsor of the Winter Arc challenge and is not involved in any way
In-app purchases are processed and managed by Apple
For purchase-related issues, refunds, or billing questions, contact Apple Support
Apple has no obligation or liability with respect to the App or your use of it

quickSummary.title: Privacy Policy Quick Summary
quickSummary.description: This is a brief overview. Please read the full policy above for complete details.
points: ✓ We collect personal info, health data, and usage data to provide the Winter Arc experience
✓ Photos stay on YOUR device unless you enable backup sync
✓ We do NOT sell your personal information
✓ Third parties (RevenueCat, cloud storage) help us operate the app
✓ You can delete your account and data anytime
✓ We use industry-standard security to protect your data
✓ This is NOT medical advice - consult a healthcare provider for health decisions
✓ You have rights to access, correct, and delete your data
